contest-event.event-date: Oct. 31, 1987 D National Mineworkers (Championship Section) National Mineworkers (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest National Mineworkers Contest national-mineworkers-championship-section This contest became the Butlins Mineworkers Contest in 2003.
